alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 8:33PM MST until August 23 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... Northeastern Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... * Until 915 PM MST. * At 833 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Quartzsite to 11 miles southwest of Kofa Wildlife Refuge to 23 miles west of Sundad, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Yuma Proving Ground, Cibola and Palm Canyon. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 8 and 9. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 59 and 92. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
